subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Dane Richards, who missed the first month of the M.L.S. season with a knee injury, resurfaced in the starting lineup Sunday to oust the two-time defending champion Houston Dynamo.
snippet: Dane Richards, who missed the first month of the M.L.S. season with a knee injury, resurfaced in the starting lineup Sunday to oust the two-time defending champion Houston Dynamo.
